Description:
HASSLE FREE HOME ON HIGH
Much cherished and lovingly cared for over time, this deceptively spacious home has had only one owner since being first built in the 1970's and is rock solid throughout. This has been a family friendly home complete with 3 roomy bedrooms each with ample robe space, plus totally separate bathroom, shower room, toilet and powder room all located nearby. Creating a warm family focus and a great place to gather, the magnificent sunken living and formal dining offers plenty of large sunlit windows inviting outside views and gentle breezes. The heart of any busy home is the kitchen, which in this case is spacious, has been re-modelled and offers handy built-in meals nook for mealtimes on the run, plenty of cupboards and bench space, walk-in pantry and practical servery windows to both dining and the outdoors. With convenient side access to the backyard, double lock-up garage and 4 car carport with roller doors, this secure and thriving garden allows kids and pets the space and freedom to run and play safely. A leisurely stroll to Lansell shopping with Kangaroo Flat shops and recreational facilities close by, there are also a variety of childcare options and schools to choose from. A comfortable and easy to maintain home with loads of options and possibilities!
Insights: 367 High Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
STUNNING CONTEMPORARY STYLE AND SOPHISTICATION
Located at the very top of Byambee Rises Estate, and directly across the road from a playground and park, is this immaculate double storey property. With easy access to Lansell Square and bus stops, and just minutes from the Kangaroo Flat train station, this stunning home is beautifully presented both inside and out.
With fantastic curb appeal, a beautifully landscaped garden welcomes you to the home. A large entry leads to secure access into the double garage on one side, and on the other is a fantastic guest suite. This generously proportioned room includes built-in robes and a two-way bathroom that serves as an ensuite. A separate toilet, linen closet and understair closet are just a few of the clever design features found in the home. A second bedroom with built-in robe is neatly tucked away, as is the spacious laundry – complete with walk-in storage and access to the side yard. At the rear of the ground floor is a large living space that currently serves as a secondary living and dining room, but would also make an excellent rumpus room and study nook.
Up the carpeted stairs is a large landing leading to a powder room, fourth bedroom and the generous master bedroom. The master enjoys a large walk-in robe running along the full side of the room, and to the other side is an ensuite with double vanity, walk-in shower and separate toilet. An open plan kitchen, living and dining room completes the internal design and this high-end area includes stunning light fittings, Caesar stone benchtops, black sink and tapware, walk-in pantry and a lovely balcony with sensational views over the city and forest.
The beautifully manicured outdoor space features a paved alfresco area, sunny courtyard and established mop top trees with neat hedging. A lawn area adds to the many places to sit and relax, and the double garage provides vehicle access and single door access to the back garden.
Additional features include:
Ducted refrigerative cooling and ducted heating throughout
Ducted vacuum system
Modern appliances including five-burner gas cooktop, 900mm oven and dishwasher
Tinted windows with blockout thermal blinds
Automatic sprinkler system
Garden shed
Access from both sides of the house to the rear garden
Close to all amenities and conveniently located on the Melbourne side of the city, this elevated two-storey property is absolutely ideal for a professional seeking a home with a quality design and finish. Alternatively, with a small and beautifully maintained garden and spacious floor plan, this is the ideal property for an older family or a buyer looking to downsize without compromising on lifestyle.

Description:
A great place for the family
Located in the heart of Kangaroo Flat, this home is surrounded by beautiful parks, ovals, the new Leisure Centre and quality schooling options. It’s a five minute stroll to the Kangaroo Flat Station and only a two minute drive to the local shops. You’re absolutely spoilt for choice when it comes to schools – Kangaroo Flat Primary and St Monica's School are all within walking distance (Bendigo Special Development School, Crusoe Collage and Multiple Child Care Options).
As you enter the property you'll find three bedrooms, all of generous size. The home hosts a list of features including modern open plan kitchen with ample storage, climate control year-round with gas ducted heating and ducted evaporative cooling. A separate lounge room is a great place for the family to gather with the polished floor boards being the highlight throughout. There is a beautiful outdoor entertaining area and fully fenced backyard, just the spot for summer barbeques with friends while the kids play on the lawn.
FEATURES
- Gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling
- Stainless steel appliances
- Outdoor entertaining area
- Polished floor boards
- Modern kitchen with easy flow
- Light and bright dining area
- Central to local schools, cafes and parks
- 3x6m shed with slab and power
- The property encompasses 537sqm in land
Ticking a lot of boxes for house hunters seeking a combination of close proximity to shopping, cafes and public transport within a short walking distance. This is a must to inspect offering many options to the astute purchaser.
Estimated rental $320.00 per week yielding 5.84% return.

Description:
NEAT AS A PIN WITH GREAT GARDEN!
Located only a stone's throw from Kangaroo Flat's main shopping strip is this immaculate brick veneer unit ready for you to move into or hold as an investment.
The unit itself comprises two large bedrooms, both with built-in-robes and ceiling fans, large lounge area with split system and Rinnai gas heater, kitchen equipped with plenty of cupboard space and electric cooking. The three-piece bathroom includes a shower which sits separately from the bath, and an updated vanity. Access to the toilet is provided by walking through the bathroom or through the functional sized laundry. Stepping into the private and well-fenced backyard of the unit you will find an established and well-maintained garden of which the lovely red geraniums are a highlight, and twice the utility with TWO clotheslines. A remote control single-car garage provides you with safe storage of your car (which you will be able to leave there since everything is handy walking distance!)
The complex the unit sits within is peaceful and extremely well-maintained. Beside the unit, a huge lawn area with established trees provides the perfect place to socialise with your neighbours or simply relax in the shade with a book.
This property would suit anybody considering downsizing, or looking for their first home. It would also make an ideal investment proposition, with an expected rental return of up to $260 per week.
Contact now for further information - don't wait!

Description:
HIGH QUALITY HOME WITH BEAUTIFUL LAKE VIEWS
** Retirees, Downsizers and Quality Home Seekers take note!! **
Situated in a quiet peaceful location in the excellent Forest Lake Estate is this quality built, individually designed modern contemporary home with so much to offer the quality home seeker. Perched in a prime, elevated position offering the perfect vantage point opposite Forest Lakes Reserve with beautiful lake views, there is nothing to do here but move in and live comfortably immediately and enjoy your new lifestyle.
The first thing you notice when arriving at the property is its striking presence and unique curb side appeal. A lovely entry way leads to an impressive floor plan within that is spacious enough for a young family, but perfectly intimate for a couple to thrive. Three good sized bedrooms provide accommodation, all with built in robes; the master complete with walk in robe and own three piece ensuite. A second or main bathroom separates the bedrooms at the rear, and includes bath, shower and toilet. A third toilet is located off the large laundry area which is complete with loads of storage and bench space. Living space is aplenty, thanks to the light bright and spacious front lounge, with huge glass windows providing a tranquil outlook of the lake and reserve beyond. The secondary living space also offers a fabulous outlook of the outdoor living area, and forms part of the open space at the rear of the home. Also incorporating the kitchen, dining and study nook, this area is the real heart and hub of the home. The kitchen is extremely well equipped, and boasts electric cooking appliances, dishwasher, and an abundance of cupboard and bench space. Other internal features include ducted temperature control throughout, and a ducted vacuuming system.
Externally the home sits on a beautifully established and manageable 690m2 (approx.) allotment. The thriving healthy garden is delightful and a credit the the fruits of our vendors labour. A watering system is installed both front and back, making the garden easy care and in keeping with the low maintenance nature of the yard. The paved and covered courtyard provides a fabulous and private outdoor living space to relax in and admire your leafy surrounds. The double auto garage at the front has roller door access to the yard, where there is currently a tool shed but room for a bigger one if required!
Fabulous lake vistas on the Melbourne side of suburban Bendigo close to transport and a short drive to schools and amenities including Lansell Square shopping centre. The perfect home for retirees, downsizers and quality home seekers alike. An inspection is a must, call now to arrange a time to inspect

Description:
First Homebuyers/Investors – New Kitchen & Bathroom
A surprise packet upon inspection as the property has undergone refurbishment. Simply move in and enjoy from day one. Features include a new kitchen with stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances, new bathroom with double vanity, fresh paint and striking new flooring throughout. All bedrooms include built in robes, the lounge is generous in size with gas heating and air-conditioner plus a kitchen with breakfast bar and adjoining meals area. From inside to out the home includes a double carport with remote roller door, garden shed and sliding door access to the yard, being an ideal space to create an outdoor living space. Situated in a well kept court, close to Bunnings, Centro Plaza shopping & transport this position offers convenience and low maintenance living. A great start or investment.

Description:
Retire with space and comfort
Positioned at the end of a quiet court, this lovely three-bedroom villa located in Aviva Residential Village offers very affordable, independent living for over 55s.
The cathedral ceiling enhances the spaciousness of the open plan living area, which includes a lounge, kitchen and dining space. The kitchen has a 600mm electric wall oven, a 4 burner gas cooktop, a pantry, plenty of bench space and additional storage.
The bedrooms are a generous size, all boasting built-in robes and ceiling fan. The third bedroom could be used as a second living area, study or craft room. The bathroom has 900mm x 1200mm shower and a vanity with built-in storage. The separate toilet is adjacent. The laundry is well appointed and offers two storage cupboards.
Outside there is a single carport space and a garden shed with lights, power and concrete floor. Heating and cooling are taken care of with ducted gas heating, ducted evaporative cooling and ceiling fans.
Set in lovely garden surrounds, village residents enjoy a relaxed, low maintenance lifestyle amid like-minded neighbours with the added benefit of community facilities such as CCTV security, community centre incorporating lounge, kitchen, library, meeting room, gym, cinema, indoor/outdoor bowling, inground swimming pool, workshop/woodworking room and has a place to store the boat or caravan between trips.
It's a short walk to Lansell Square Shopping Centre with public transport at the front and walking tracks nearby. Call for further information about Unit 82 today.
Insights: 3 other 3 bedroom unit in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
SOLID, MODERN AND YARD SPACE!!
This brick veneer home is super solid, modernised and re-furbished and ripe for a new owner who wants to just move in and do nothing!
Looks very sharp from the kerb, there is good fencing and a landscaped front yard with parking for three vehicles and there's a garage/workshop and a large garden shed in the rear yard.
The home has had plenty of work done over the past three years including new carpets, re-painting, new front and rear screen doors, new window furnishings, new kitchen, bathroom and laundry and the property has NBN available.
There is a good-sized carpeted lounge on entry with an adjacent meals space boasting polished timber floors. The re-modelled kitchen is adjacent and boasts quality appliances such a 5-burner hot plate and under-bench oven; double sink, dishwasher, timber bench-tops and ample cabinetry – it is superb.
There are fully fitted built-in robes to the three bedrooms, the bathroom is superb with extensive tiling, 1200mm frameless shower, vanity with storage and a separate toilet room. The laundry boasts good storage and timber bench and is handy to the kitchen and bedrooms.
The home also boasts ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling throughout, new LED downlights in living spaces, new spouts and plumbing work. Located on a good sized 603m2 yard with good fencing and a recently landscaped front.
As solid as the day it was built, everything is in good order and location is great with transport close, you're two mins to Lansell Square, Primary and Secondary Schools and shops. There's a playground close and you're a two-minute walk to Forest Lake.
Insights: 40 Queen Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect Downsizer or Investment
Set in a quiet pocket of the ever growing Kangaroo Flat is this lovely steel framed, neatly presented home. Offering a master bedroom with walk-in-robe and ensuite, 2 other bedrooms with built ins, a separate lounge plus an open style kitchen/meals/family room. The kitchen with double pantry, gas stove top, electric oven and ample bench space to prepare family dinners. A three piece bathroom, toilet and laundry as well as ducted heating and evaporative cooling for comfort all year round.
The outdoors offers a double remote garage with a rear single roller door, a garden shed with concrete floor, a blank canvas front and rear yard for you to add your own touch and a side access perfect to store the caravan, boat or trailer.
Close to public transport and schools, NBN connected.
*Lovely quiet location
*3 bedrooms - master with ensuite and walk in robe
*Open plan kitchen/meals/family room
*Ducted heating and evaporative cooling
*Double garage with rear access
*Side access for caravan or trailer
*Blank canvas front and rear yard - make it your own
*595m2

Description:
BUILD YOUR DREAM HOME OR INVEST
The magnificent block is located in the heart of Kangaroo Flat in the Lakeside Park Estate, one of Bendigo's newest and most exciting residential land developments.
Set only 1 hour & 40 mins from Melbourne CBD, the lot is situated close to all of Kangaroo Flats amenities including, Schools, Lansell Square Shopping Centre, Medical Facilities, transport and Sports & Recreational Reserves this block of land is a terrific place to build!
With an allotment size of 511m2 on the high side of this quiet court there is ample space to construct your dream home.
All services are available, the lot is partially fenced and there is a beautiful street tree on the nature strip which over time will mature and set off your new home.
The estate displays 2 large water basins on the entrance and connects through to Ritchie Drive and allowing the new residents to enjoy the luxury of Forest Lake and the surrounding trails.
With the construction of many excellent properties already completed you will see the potential of this excellent investment into your future.
Insights: 8 Eldridge Court, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
QUALITY BUILDERS HOME AND VIEWS
This modern brick veneer has living area and bedrooms on street level with a north facing balcony leading from the family/meals area giving delightful views over the city skyline. The home comprises of three bedrooms plus a study or fourth bedroom. Main with ensuite and all bedrooms have built-in robes, a family room plus open plan meals area is adjacent to the kitchen with timber cabinetry, wall oven, hotplates and dishwasher, main lounge for family and friends to gather and this area is open, bright and inviting. Ducted heating and cooling and as-new carpets, low maintenance front garden plus 2 carparks, compact rear fenced yard ideal for children and pets plus another lower double garage with auto doors under the house with room for 2 cars plus a trailer to the side of the home. This property is low maintenance with balcony views and would e of interest to many. Inspect Now!!

Description:
Great First Home or Investment Property
Located in a fantastic position in Kangaroo Flat, finds this 4-bedroom property, home to the current owners for 48 years.
The kitchen has an updated gas oven and plenty of cupboard space, and the very large lounge area with wall heater is great for family entertaining.
2 bedrooms are a decent size while the 3rd is extremely large and could be used as another living area.
There is also smaller 4th bedroom. Two of the bedrooms have wall to wall built-in robes.
The 2 living areas both cater for a large family, plus there is plenty of storage throughout. A number of split-system cooling/heating units are throughout the home.
Outside in the spacious rear yard you will find plenty of room for the family pets, along with a double garage and workshop with power and concrete floor.
An undercover pergola area is ideal for BBQs. Also included is a carport for the boat and 2 garden sheds. This is a great family home, and the convenient location is an asset with a lot of amenities at your fingertips. Bus stops, schools and a wide variety of shops and supermarkets are close by, so you won't need to travel far. A fantastic opportunity to enter the property market at a very affordable price. Inspect now!

Description:
Transform Your Retirement
Situated within Aviva Lifestyle Village, Kangaroo Flat is this very neat and tidy 2 bedroom plus study design. Step inside and be surprised by the spacious and light filled living area with split system heating and cooling and additional ceiling fan. The adjoining kitchen includes an abundance of bench space for those who love to be in the heart of the home and overlooks the dining area - adding a social feel to the floorplan. The rest of the home flows through to a second bedroom with built-in robes, a private study perfect for a multitude of uses and a master suite offering triple robes, ceiling fan and plenty of space. There is no shortage of storage with plenty on offer within the kitchen and to the rear of the home. The two piece bathroom houses extended bench space and wide shower with plenty of natural light. Separate toilet and European laundry are bonus features. This home must be seen to be appreciated and is positioned close to the Bowling Green, Village Entry and the Community Centre. An exceptional opportunity to gain entry into this ever popular lifestyle choice with nothing to do except for move in and enjoy this free flowing, presentable home surrounded by a like minded community.
Insights: 24 other 2 bedroom unit in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Address: 229 MacKenzie Street West Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Entry Level Home with Enviable Block Size
If a large block and potential are your "must haves" then don't go past this newly listed property. Situated on ever popular Mackenzie Street West and offering hard to find land size. A simple 3 bedroom residence occupies 888sqms of land with a charming red brick garden shed, access to the yard via double gates with plenty of room for that dream shed, a separate bungalow - perfect for a teenagers retreat or space to work from home, and brick paved area for outside entertaining on those warmer evenings. A front porch overlooks the yard, offering privacy and seclusion. Step inside to the open plan kitchen/living area with split system heating and cooling as well as additional gas heater. All 3 bedrooms are off the main hallway with the master offering built-in robes and ceiling fan. The 3 piece bathroom is in original condition. Situated close to schools and the Kangaroo Flat CBD with the added bonus of a bus stop close by.
An excellent long term tenant is in place and would love to stay on if you are an investor looking to reap some return, Otherwise this home offers the perfect opportunity to comfortably step into the Bendigo market and capitalise on the potential and position on offer here.
